mods.abstract: DETAINED in the Jail of the Parish of St. John the Baptist since the 11th instant a runaway boy, calling himself PEGGY, and saying to be the property of MM. Choppin & Roman, parish of St James, said boy measuring 5 feet 6 inches, is about 38 years old, had on when arrested one iron ring fastened to his leg. The owner of said slave is duly requested to claim him according to the law. NUMA TREPAGNIER. Dty Sheriff.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
